subject: Basketball (College)
Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
Homosexuality and Bisexuality
Discrimination
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: A new law in Indiana allowing businesses to refuse service to same-sex couples may force sports officials to evaluate whether to hold major events in Indianapolis, which is hosting the Final Four next week.
snippet: A new law in Indiana allowing businesses to refuse service to same-sex couples may force sports officials to evaluate whether to hold major events in Indianapolis, which is hosting the Final Four next week.
